document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of bat-associated macronyssid mites (Acari: Gamasina: Macronyssidae) of Russia, with new host and geographical records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality:
Zoo of Hamburg ( Germany ) ( Willmann, 1936 )
.

Type host:
[
Solenodon paradoxus Brandt, 1833
] (from feces) ( Willmann, 1936 ).

Material. M ex
Pipistrellus pygmaeus
from biological station “Venevitinovo”, 4 June 2019 , leg. I. V . Budaeva; F, 16 N1 ex
Pipistrellus nathusii
from State Nature Reserve “Samarskaya Luka”, 1-31 July 2006 , leg. D.G. Smirnov; 2 N1 ex
Vespertilio murinus
from Biological station “Kolarovo”, 11 September 2015 , leg. A. V . Zhigalin; N1 ex
Myotis sibiricus
from Tigirekskiy State Natural Reserve, 16 June 2016 , leg. A. V . Zhigalin, O.L. Orlov; N1 ex
Myotis sibiricus
from State Natural Reserve “Barguzinskiy”, 2 July 2015 , leg. D. V . Kazakov; N1 ex
Myotis petax
from Okhotnichiya cave, 4 September 2015 , leg. D. V . Kazakov; F, M, N1 ex
Eptesicus nilssonii
from lake Gusinoe, 30 June 2016 , leg. D. V . Kazakov; N1 ex
Myotis sibiricus
from Argaley-3 cave, 21 May 2016 , leg. D. V . Kazakov; M ex
Ep . nilssonii
from Nizhniy Tsasuchey, 18 July 2015 ; M, 2 N1 ex
Myotis davidii
from Adun-Chelon, 24 July 2015 , leg. D. V . Kazakov.

Distribution outside Russian Federation :
Europe ( Radovsky, 1967 ). Asia ( Radovsky, 1967 ).

Hosts . [
Solenodon paradoxus
],

( Stanyukovich, 1997 ;
Orlova et al ., 2015d

(as
